# Gaming sample code projects

Explore a collection of projects relating to game development.## [Overview](/documentation/RealityKit/game-development-sample-code#Overview)

[ Bringing your SceneKit projects to RealityKit Adapt a platformer game for RealityKit’s powerful ECS and modularity. View sample code ](/documentation/realitykit/bringing-your-scenekit-projects-to-realitykit)[ Creating a Spaceship game Build an immersive game using RealityKit audio, simulation, and rendering features. View sample code ](/documentation/realitykit/creating-a-spaceship-game)[ BOT-anist Build a multiplatform app that uses windows, volumes, and animations to create a robot botanist’s greenhouse. View sample code ](/documentation/visionOS/BOT-anist)[ Rendering a windowed game in stereo Bring an iOS or iPadOS game to visionOS and enhance it. View sample code ](/documentation/realitykit/rendering-a-windowed-game-in-stereo)[ Happy Beam Leverage a Full Space to create a fun game using ARKit. View sample code ](/documentation/visionOS/happybeam)[ Swift Splash Use RealityKit to create an interactive ride in visionOS. View sample code ](/documentation/visionOS/swift-splash)[ Destination Video Leverage SwiftUI to build an immersive media experience in a multiplatform app. View sample code ](/documentation/visionOS/destination-video)[ Creating a game with scene understanding Create AR games and experiences that interact with real-world objects on LiDAR-equipped iOS devices. View sample code ](/documentation/realitykit/creating-a-game-with-scene-understanding)## [Topics](/documentation/RealityKit/game-development-sample-code#topics)

### [Sample code links](/documentation/RealityKit/game-development-sample-code#Sample-code-links)

[Bringing your SceneKit projects to RealityKit](/documentation/realitykit/bringing-your-scenekit-projects-to-realitykit)Adapt a platformer game for RealityKit’s powerful ECS and modularity.[Creating a Spaceship game](/documentation/realitykit/creating-a-spaceship-game)Build an immersive game using RealityKit audio, simulation, and rendering features.[BOT-anist](/documentation/visionOS/BOT-anist)Build a multiplatform app that uses windows, volumes, and animations to create a robot botanist’s greenhouse.[Rendering a windowed game in stereo](/documentation/realitykit/rendering-a-windowed-game-in-stereo)Bring an iOS or iPadOS game to visionOS and enhance it.[Happy Beam](/documentation/visionOS/happybeam)Leverage a Full Space to create a fun game using ARKit.[Swift Splash](/documentation/visionOS/swift-splash)Use RealityKit to create an interactive ride in visionOS.[Destination Video](/documentation/visionOS/destination-video)Leverage SwiftUI to build an immersive media experience in a multiplatform app.[Creating a game with scene understanding](/documentation/realitykit/creating-a-game-with-scene-understanding)Create AR games and experiences that interact with real-world objects on LiDAR-equipped iOS devices.## [See Also](/documentation/RealityKit/game-development-sample-code#see-also)

### [Game development](/documentation/RealityKit/game-development-sample-code#Game-development)

[Entity animations](/documentation/realitykit/game-development-entity-animations)Dynamically move, rotate, and scale entities at runtime.[Character control, skeletons, and inverse kinematics](/documentation/realitykit/game-development-character-skeletons)Direct the movements and animation of models.
